EmailTemplate.name: RE: Follow up: Net Cash Estimates (1322504639.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow up: Net Cash Estimates (1322504639.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Re: Follow up: Net Cash Estimates 1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Stan,
That is great to hear! I look forward to working with you. The next steps would be for me to send you a link to enroll in our system which I will do in a separate email. The enrollment is all online and at the end there is an enrollment packet for you to print off with an I-9 form included. Please take the I9 to a local notary to have them sign as an authorized representative and email or fax this document back to me.
The other piece is for you to introduce me to the client you will be working with (once you have finished negotiating your rate/scope of work) for me to work with them to get an executed Master Service Agreement in place.
Who is the client that you will be working with and when do you expect to start? I would be happy to reach out to them directly to give them some information regarding MBO and explain our program to them.
Please let me know if you have any additional questions for me.
Thank you and have a great day! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Hayward Florer [mailto:florerhs@cox.net] Sent: Monday, November 28, 2011 12:41 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Follow up: Net Cash Estimates
Nicolette,
I decided to join MBO Partners. Please send me the details you need to have to complete this relationship.
Warmest Regards, Stan
Stan Florer 757-438-5982 cell florerhs@cox.net
On 10/27/11 11:27 AM, "Nicolette Taylor" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Stan,
Please see the attached net cash estimates for your review. I apologize for not getting them to you last night. Please let me know if you have any additional questions and I will be happy to assist you!
Thank you and have a great day,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
